He emphasized that the building symbolizes India's transformation and will be a hub for shaping policies for a 'Viksit Bharat'. The new complex aims to modernize administrative infrastructure, fostering collaboration among ministries and saving approximately Rs 1,500 crore annually.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/direction-of-nation-will-be-decided-from-here-what-pm-modi-said-about-kartavya-bhawan-top-quotes/articleshow/123143871.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/direction-of-nation-will-be-decided-from-here-what-pm-modi-said-about-kartavya-bhawan-top-quotes/articleshow/123143871.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 19:10:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19796" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123143857,imgsize-19796.cms"/></item><item><title>PM Modi likely to visit China: First trip to Beijing since 2020 Galwan clash</title><description><![CDATA[Narendra Modi will visit China for the SCO Summit. This is his first visit since the Galwan clash. The visit happens amid trade issues with the United States. Donald Trump threatens higher tariffs on India. India defends its energy strategy. Ajit Doval is in Moscow for talks on strategic partnership. Discussions will include Russian oil supplies to India.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pm-modi-to-visit-china-first-trip-to-beijing-since-2020-galwan-clash-will-attend-sco-meeting-reports/articleshow/123141445.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pm-modi-to-visit-china-first-trip-to-beijing-since-2020-galwan-clash-will-attend-sco-meeting-reports/articleshow/123141445.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 16:42:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="25334" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123141545,imgsize-25334.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump a Bihari? Fake certificate names US prez as Samastipur local</title><description><![CDATA[A bizarre incident in Bihar's Samastipur district has emerged during the Special Intensive Revision of electoral rolls, where an online application was filed claiming US President Donald Trump as a resident. The application included Trump's photo and his parents' names. Authorities rejected it and filed an FIR.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/diabolical-attempt-to-impact-sir-fake-certificate-names-donald-trump-a-bihar-local-fir-lodged/articleshow/123142884.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/diabolical-attempt-to-impact-sir-fake-certificate-names-donald-trump-a-bihar-local-fir-lodged/articleshow/123142884.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 19:00:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="699770" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123143441,imgsize-699770.cms"/></item><item><title>'India contributes more than US': RBI guv on Trump's 'dead economy' jab</title><description><![CDATA[RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra refuted Donald Trump's 'dead economy' remark, asserting India's strong economic performance and significant contribution to global growth, exceeding that of the United States. Despite concerns over potential US tariffs due to India's energy ties with Russia, Malhotra assured a stable inflation outlook, with authorities prepared to intervene if global oil prices rise to protect consumers.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/doing-very-well-rbi-guv-says-india-contributing-more-to-global-economy-than-us/articleshow/123141173.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/doing-very-well-rbi-guv-says-india-contributing-more-to-global-economy-than-us/articleshow/123141173.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 16:19:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1380051" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123141315,imgsize-1380051.cms"/></item><item><title>‘AI taking jobs’: Cofounder of $32bn Google buyout firm says, ‘Engineers should ... ’</title><description><![CDATA[Wiz CTO Ami Luttwak warns that AI-driven "vibe coding" is outpacing traditional cybersecurity, demanding a paradigm shift. He advocates for democratizing security with self-service tools integrated into developer workflows, making security accessible and impactful. Luttwak emphasizes the need for cultural changes to elevate security's importance within engineering teams, enabling developers to "vibe security" alongside coding.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/cofounder-of-the-company-google-bought-for-32-billion-says-engineers-using-ai-to-code-should-remember-hackers-too-can-/articleshow/123118211.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/cofounder-of-the-company-google-bought-for-32-billion-says-engineers-using-ai-to-code-should-remember-hackers-too-can-/articleshow/123118211.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 16:46:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="35590" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123118194,imgsize-35590.cms"/></item><item><title>EXCLUSIVE | Prasidh's coach: 'He played into England's hands initially, pulled off a 3-card trick later'</title><description><![CDATA[Prasidh Krishna's impressive comeback in the fifth Test against England, where he claimed eight wickets, played a crucial role in India's victory. His performance offers India confidence in his potential for Test matches, particularly in SENA countries, despite likely limited opportunities at home.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/exclusive-prasidh-krishnas-coach-he-played-into-englands-hands-initially-pulled-off-a-3-card-trick-later/articleshow/123143380.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/exclusive-prasidh-krishnas-coach-he-played-into-englands-hands-initially-pulled-off-a-3-card-trick-later/articleshow/123143380.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 18:59:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ARNAB MUKHERJI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="33966" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123143395,imgsize-33966.cms"/></item><item><title>Will 'Paatal Lok' star Jaideep Ahlawat play cricketer Nitish Rana in his biopic?</title><description><![CDATA[Indian cricketer Nitish Rana expressed his desire for Jaideep Ahlawat to portray him in a biopic, citing their shared Jaat heritage and Ahlawat's Haryanvi speaking ability. The area is isolated due to road breaches and a collapsed bridge, complicating relief efforts.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/uttarakhand-floods-11-army-jawans-missing-confirms-ndrf-rescue-ops-underway/articleshow/123141746.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/uttarakhand-floods-11-army-jawans-missing-confirms-ndrf-rescue-ops-underway/articleshow/123141746.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 16:59:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1623966" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123142191,imgsize-1623966.cms"/></item><item><title>Mira Murati refuses Meta's $1 bn offer: Mark Zuckerberg’s blunt response; launches a full-scale…</title><description><![CDATA[Meta's CEO, Mark Zuckerberg, reportedly attempted to acquire Mira Murati's startup, Thinking Machines Lab, with a $1 billion offer. Principal Jagdish Patil's initiative fosters dialogue, inclusivity, and leadership by positioning students face-to-face with the teacher. Tendulkar also lauded Washington Sundar's all-round contributions and defended India's decision to play on during the Manchester Test, supporting the team's spirit and dismissing concerns about England's bowlers needing rest before the final Test.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/just-a-coincidence-sachin-tendulkar-on-team-india-winning-without-jasprit-bumrah/articleshow/123141227.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/just-a-coincidence-sachin-tendulkar-on-team-india-winning-without-jasprit-bumrah/articleshow/123141227.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 16:23:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44126" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123141406,imgsize-44126.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Karni Sena worker tries to slap Swami Maurya in Fatehpur; arrested</title><description><![CDATA[In Fatehpur, Swami Prasad Maurya faced an attack. Maurya has been in the news for controversial remarks on Hinduism. His comments have sparked outrage among Hindu groups.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-karni-sena-worker-tries-to-slap-swami-maurya-in-fatehpur-arrested/articleshow/123139069.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-karni-sena-worker-tries-to-slap-swami-maurya-in-fatehpur-arrested/articleshow/123139069.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 14:57:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63698" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123139301,imgsize-63698.cms"/></item><item><title>Kartavya Bhawan inaugurated; key things to know about high-tech building</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated Kartavya Bhavan, the first building under the Common Central Secretariat project, designed to consolidate government offices for improved efficiency. Key ministries, including Home Affairs and External Affairs, will relocate from Raisina Hills to this modern, energy-efficient complex. The broader Central Vista redevelopment aims to modernize government infrastructure and consolidate operations by June 2027.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/part-of-central-vista-project-kartavya-bhawan-inaugurated-key-things-to-know-about-the-high-tech-building/articleshow/123137248.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/part-of-central-vista-project-kartavya-bhawan-inaugurated-key-things-to-know-about-the-high-tech-building/articleshow/123137248.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 13:46:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1063698" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123137832,imgsize-1063698.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump, Gretzky and Tkachuk to revive youth Presidential Fitness Test</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump's President's Council on Sports, Fitness, and Nutrition includes Wayne Gretzky and Matthew Tkachuk. The Council will focus on fitness in schools. It aims to restore college athletic customs and protect women's sports. Matthew Tkachuk impressed the White House during the Florida Panthers' visit. He will help shape fitness programs for kids.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/matthew-tkachuk-and-wayne-gretzky-team-up-with-donald-trump-to-revive-iconic-presidential-fitness-test-for-youth/articleshow/123104387.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/matthew-tkachuk-and-wayne-gretzky-team-up-with-donald-trump-to-revive-iconic-presidential-fitness-test-for-youth/articleshow/123104387.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 03:12:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1422022" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123104383,imgsize-1422022.cms"/></item><item><title>Gabrielle union says menopause made motherhood harder, more emotional</title><description><![CDATA[Hollywood actress Gabrielle Union discussed her experience with menopause and motherhood. She spoke about the challenges she faced, including hot flashes and memory loss. Union also mentioned the impact of an autoimmune issue. She and Dwyane Wade welcomed their daughter, Kaavia, via surrogacy in 2018. Union had previously experienced miscarriages.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/it-makes-it-hard-dwyane-wades-wife-gabrielle-union-says-menopause-made-motherhood-more-emotional-and-physically-exhausting/articleshow/123050826.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/it-makes-it-hard-dwyane-wades-wife-gabrielle-union-says-menopause-made-motherhood-more-emotional-and-physically-exhausting/articleshow/123050826.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 00:31:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1290157" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123050873,imgsize-1290157.cms"/></item><item><title>Afghanistan earthquake: Two tremors strike region within hours; no damage reported so far</title><description><![CDATA[Afghanistan was struck by a 4.4 magnitude earthquake on Wednesday at a depth of 155 kilometers, following a 4.2 magnitude quake earlier in the day. This seismic activity is part of a series of recent earthquakes in the region, including a 5.5 magnitude quake on August 2.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/south-asia/afghanistan-earthquake-two-tremors-strike-region-within-hours-no-damage-reported-so-far/articleshow/123139919.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/south-asia/afghanistan-earthquake-two-tremors-strike-region-within-hours-no-damage-reported-so-far/articleshow/123139919.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 15:23:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="727677" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123140011,imgsize-727677.cms"/></item><item><title>'Another Pak diplomat quits': Army recalls 1971 war 'build-up'; highlights it in 'this day that year' post</title><description><![CDATA[The Army revisits the 1971 war with Pakistan. Newspaper clippings from 1971 show Pakistan's military buildup. They also highlight unrest in then-East Pakistan. The US backed Pakistan during the war. This reminder follows India's rejection of US criticism over energy trade with Russia. Tensions between India and Pakistan are currently high after a terror attack.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/another-pak-diplomat-quits-army-recalls-1971-war-build-up-highlights-it-in-this-day-that-year-post/articleshow/123135859.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/another-pak-diplomat-quits-army-recalls-1971-war-build-up-highlights-it-in-this-day-that-year-post/articleshow/123135859.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 12:27:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="804492" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135886,imgsize-804492.cms"/></item><item><title>'Irresponsible statements': BJP to file contempt petition against Priyanka's SC remarks</title><description><![CDATA[The BJP plans to file a contempt of court petition against Priyanka Gandhi Vadra for her remarks defending Rahul Gandhi after the Supreme Court criticized his comments during the Bharat Jodo Yatra. BJP MP Manan Kumar Mishra deemed her statements "irresponsible.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/irresponsible-statements-priyanka-gandhis-take-on-sc-remarks-draws-flak-bjp-may-file-contempt-petition/articleshow/123138944.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/irresponsible-statements-priyanka-gandhis-take-on-sc-remarks-draws-flak-bjp-may-file-contempt-petition/articleshow/123138944.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 14:35:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1062614" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123139012,imgsize-1062614.cms"/></item><item><title>IITian, 26, non-smoker, gets stage 3 lung cancer: "The treatment was..."</title><description><![CDATA[After gathering the courage to tell her family. Rasika began treatment. She said, "The treatment was brutal. I lost 10 kgs. My skin broke out in painful rashes. I covered every mirror at home because I couldn’t bear to see myself. Amidst all this, there were nights I’d stay up & wonder, ‘Should I just end it here?’ But, I found slivers of strength–from the quiet corners of my being, & from my family & friends who refused to let me give up."]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/an-iitian-who-never-smoked-was-diagnosed-with-stage-3-lung-cancer-at-26-shocked-she-decided-to-fight-back-the-treatment-was-/articleshow/123131349.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/an-iitian-who-never-smoked-was-diagnosed-with-stage-3-lung-cancer-at-26-shocked-she-decided-to-fight-back-the-treatment-was-/articleshow/123131349.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 08:31:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63534" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123131330,imgsize-63534.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Brett Lee wins hearts by folding hands, saying 'Sat Sri Akaal' to young Sikh fan</title><description><![CDATA[Australia Champions faced a narrow one-run defeat against South Africa Champions in the World Championship of Legends semi-final, despite strong performances from Dan Christian and Peter Siddle. While infrastructure expands, persistent underutilisation raises concerns about accessibility, affordability, and systemic inefficiencies in medical admissions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/thousands-of-medical-seats-are-going-vacant-whats-really-wrong-with-mbbs-admissions-in-india/articleshow/123139247.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/thousands-of-medical-seats-are-going-vacant-whats-really-wrong-with-mbbs-admissions-in-india/articleshow/123139247.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 14:56:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30222" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123139412,imgsize-30222.cms"/></item><item><title>Stars betray fugitive: Astrologer busted 15 years after kidnapping employers wife</title><description><![CDATA[Surat PCB apprehended Bhargav, a 39-year-old man, after 15 years on the run for abducting his employer's wife in 2010. Bhargav evaded police by shifting between Rajasthan and Delhi, recently returning to Surat where he was caught near Dabholi Crossroads.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/surat/fugitive-caught-15-years-after-kidnapping-employers-wife/articleshow/123125164.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/surat/fugitive-caught-15-years-after-kidnapping-employers-wife/articleshow/123125164.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 23:25:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="587351" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123140363,imgsize-587351.cms"/></item><item><title>'You are great': Virat Kohli's sister pens emotional note for Siraj - READ</title><description><![CDATA[Following Mohammed Siraj's stellar performance at The Oval, Virat Kohli's sister, Bhawna Kohli Dhingra, lauded his efforts in India's victory against England. His crucial nine-wicket match haul at The Oval secured a narrow win for India, drawing the series 2-2.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/you-are-great-virat-kohlis-sister-pens-emotional-note-for-mohammed-siraj/articleshow/123138780.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/you-are-great-virat-kohlis-sister-pens-emotional-note-for-mohammed-siraj/articleshow/123138780.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 14:42:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="161672" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123139112,imgsize-161672.cms"/></item><item><title>Fake cops, crypto trail: All you need to know about Rs 260cr global cyber fraud</title><description><![CDATA[The Enforcement Directorate (ED) has launched an investigation into a Rs 260 crore global cyber fraud, conducting searches across multiple cities. He lauded Sundar's adaptability and reiterated his full support for the team's approach.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-sachin-tendulkar-breaks-silence-on-handshake-controversy-asks-why-should-englands-bowlers-be-kept-fresh/articleshow/123137433.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-sachin-tendulkar-breaks-silence-on-handshake-controversy-asks-why-should-englands-bowlers-be-kept-fresh/articleshow/123137433.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 13:21:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="61088" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123137616,imgsize-61088.cms"/></item><item><title>If India cuts Russian crude under US pressure, will inflation rise? Despite geopolitical tensions, the RBI held its repo rate steady, forecasting stable growth and controlled inflation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/tariff-war-as-trump-pressures-india-to-cut-russian-oil-will-inflation-rise-if-crude-stops-rbi-governor-sanjay-malhotra-explains/articleshow/123137675.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/tariff-war-as-trump-pressures-india-to-cut-russian-oil-will-inflation-rise-if-crude-stops-rbi-governor-sanjay-malhotra-explains/articleshow/123137675.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 13:29:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="65262" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123137776,imgsize-65262.cms"/></item><item><title>Uttarkashi disaster: Video shows Dharali destroyed in 20 seconds; buildings crumbled like cardboard</title><description><![CDATA[Terrifying videos captured the moment a massive wave of water and debris devastated Dharali village in Uttarkashi district, flattening buildings and sweeping away people. The surge, triggered around 1:50 pm, reduced the bustling marketplace to rubble in seconds. Brook acknowledged Root's higher run tally and overall impact, highlighting his teammate's enduring class. The series concluded in a 2-2 draw, showcasing a thrilling battle between England and India.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-harry-brook-disagrees-with-gautam-gambhir-says-didnt-score-as-many-runs-/articleshow/123138729.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-harry-brook-disagrees-with-gautam-gambhir-says-didnt-score-as-many-runs-/articleshow/123138729.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 14:26:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="55888" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123138841,imgsize-55888.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump was asked about India’s claim on US importing Russian uranium, fertilisers; his response</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst criticism over India's Russian oil purchases, US President Donald Trump claimed ignorance about the US importing fertilizers and chemicals from Russia. He accused India of profiting from reselling Russian oil and threatened tariff hikes, prompting a strong rebuttal from India, which cited strategic necessity and questioned the hypocrisy of Western nations continuing their trade with Russia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/trade-war-trump-was-asked-about-indias-claim-on-us-importing-russian-uranium-fertilisers-heres-his-response/articleshow/123131430.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/trade-war-trump-was-asked-about-indias-claim-on-us-importing-russian-uranium-fertilisers-heres-his-response/articleshow/123131430.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 08:38:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31346" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123131560,imgsize-31346.cms"/></item><item><title>NSDL IPO listing: Company shares list 15% higher than issue price of Rs 800</title><description><![CDATA[NSDL shares debuted strongly on Wednesday, listing at a 15% premium over the issue price of Rs 800, reaching Rs 920 and a market valuation of Rs 18,249 crore. The Rs 4,011 crore IPO was oversubscribed 41 times.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/nsdl-ipo-listing-today-company-makes-strong-debut-shares-list-15-higher-than-issue-price-of-rs-800/articleshow/123134655.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/nsdl-ipo-listing-today-company-makes-strong-debut-shares-list-15-higher-than-issue-price-of-rs-800/articleshow/123134655.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 11:37:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="16286" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135377,imgsize-16286.cms"/></item><item><title>'Don't burn him out': Ex-India pacer sounds alarm, says Siraj is in Bumrah's league</title><description><![CDATA[Following Mohammed Siraj's impressive performance in England, RP Singh cautioned against overworking him, emphasising the need for careful workload management akin to Jasprit Bumrah to prevent potential burnout. Singh highlighted Siraj's indispensable role and partnership with Bumrah, advocating for strategic team selections and like-for-like injury substitutions to maintain team balance and player well-being.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/dont-burn-him-out-rp-singh-sounds-alarm-says-mohammed-siraj-is-in-jasprit-bumrahs-league/articleshow/123135279.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/dont-burn-him-out-rp-singh-sounds-alarm-says-mohammed-siraj-is-in-jasprit-bumrahs-league/articleshow/123135279.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 12:01:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57012" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135362,imgsize-57012.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump's tariff threat on India: What RBI guv Sanjay Malhotra said on GDP growth</title><description><![CDATA[RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra acknowledges the difficulty in predicting the impact of potential US tariffs on India's GDP growth. While the central bank retained its 6.5% GDP forecast for fiscal year 2025-26 and kept the repo rate unchanged, Malhotra emphasized ongoing global uncertainties.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trumps-higher-tariff-threat-on-india-what-rbi-governor-sanjay-malhotra-said-on-gdp-growth-really-very-difficult-to-/articleshow/123135823.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trumps-higher-tariff-threat-on-india-what-rbi-governor-sanjay-malhotra-said-on-gdp-growth-really-very-difficult-to-/articleshow/123135823.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 12:23:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60098" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135856,imgsize-60098.cms"/></item><item><title>Mohali blast: 2 killed, three injured in explosion at oxygen cylinder plant</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mohali-blast-2-killed-three-injured-in-explosion-at-oxygen-cylinder-plant-what-we-know/articleshow/123134822.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mohali-blast-2-killed-three-injured-in-explosion-at-oxygen-cylinder-plant-what-we-know/articleshow/123134822.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 11:55:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="838179" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135225,imgsize-838179.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[The Genius Act marks a turning point for stablecoins, offering them legal legitimacy and regulatory clarity. “This legitimisation of stablecoins is certainly going to give a huge boost,” says Eswar Prasad, Professor at Cornell University.       <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK.     <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Rainbow Children’s Medicare retains 18-20% revenue growth guidance for FY26]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/earnings/rainbow-childrens-medicare-fy26-revenue-guidance-q1-earnings-19644581.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Rainbow Children’s Medicare is maintaining its FY26 revenue growth guidance of 18–20% despite a seasonal dip in occupancy. CMD Dr. Ramesh Kancharla said the company remains optimistic as demand picks up in the coming quarters. While surgical revenue rose 15%, margins are expected to moderate to 24–25% (pre-Ind AS) due to new hospital additions. Average revenue per patient is projected to grow 6% year-on-year.]]></description>
